author: fioriNTU
body:
This PR fixes a python script used by Tracker Offline shifters to dump the list of dead Pixel ROCs appearing during a run. From 10_0_X on, probably due to a python update, there were unwanted "newlines" added in the process of reading a substring from a data file resulting in a malfunctioning of the script.

The script is not part of any production workflows, it is only used by Offline shifters.
title: Fix to the Pixel Dead ROC counting during a run (Offline shifter tool)
